project.name: E-commerce Mobile App
project.description: A full-featured e-commerce mobile app with user authentication, product browsing, shopping cart, checkout, and order tracking.
project.title: E-commerce Mobile App

tasks.title: Draft Project Scope Document
tasks.description: Create and draft project scope document, including objectives, key deliverables, timeline, and team capacity.
acceptanceCriteria: The project scope document should be clear and concise.
All objectives, key deliverables, timeline, and team capacity are accurately represented.

tasks.title: Set Up Development Environment
tasks.description: Configure and set up the development environment for the project based on the chosen tech stack.
acceptanceCriteria: The development environment should be properly set up and functional.
All necessary tools and dependencies are correctly installed.

tasks.title: Design Project Layout
tasks.description: Create a wireframe or mockup of the project layout, including user interface design.
acceptanceCriteria: The project layout should be visually appealing and user-friendly.
All necessary elements are included in the design.

tasks.title: Implement Frontend Components
tasks.description: Develop frontend components based on the approved design, ensuring compatibility with the chosen tech stack.
acceptanceCriteria: The implemented frontend components are functional and visually consistent with the design.
All necessary interactions and animations are correctly implemented.

tasks.title: Set Up Backend Services
tasks.description: Create and configure backend services, including APIs, databases, and server-side logic.
acceptanceCriteria: The implemented backend services are functional and secure.
All necessary APIs, databases, and server-side logic are correctly set up.

tasks.title: Write Automated Tests
tasks.description: Develop automated tests for the frontend and backend components to ensure their functionality and compatibility.
acceptanceCriteria: All tests should pass and cover all critical functionalities.
Tests should be efficient, reliable, and maintainable.

tasks.title: Design Preliminary Wireframes
tasks.description: Create wireframes for the main pages, including homepage, product page, and checkout page.
acceptanceCriteria: Wireframes should be clearly labeled and easily understandable.
Each wireframe must include necessary UI elements.

tasks.title: Refine Wireframes into Mockups
tasks.description: Convert wireframes into high-fidelity mockups, including UI/UX details and visual design.
acceptanceCriteria: Mockups should be visually appealing and adhere to brand guidelines.
All UI/UX elements should be properly implemented.

tasks.title: Create Frontend Components Based on Mockups
tasks.description: Develop frontend components based on the provided mockups, ensuring they are responsive and accessible.
acceptanceCriteria: Components should be properly implemented according to the mockups.
All components must be responsive and accessible.

tasks.title: Implement Backend API for Product Functionality
tasks.description: Develop the backend API for product-related functionality, such as retrieving product details and handling add to cart.
acceptanceCriteria: API should be properly implemented and tested.
API endpoints must return expected data.

tasks.title: Integrate Frontend Components with Backend API
tasks.description: Connect the frontend components to the backend API, ensuring proper data flow between client and server.
dependencies: Task 3: Create Frontend Components Based on Mockups
Task 4: Implement Backend API for Product Functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Frontend components should fetch and display data from the backend correctly.
Any interaction with the API (e.g., add to cart) should work as expected.

tasks.title: Perform Functional Testing on Implemented Features
tasks.description: Test the implemented features for functionality, usability, and performance.
dependencies: Task 5: Integrate Frontend Components with Backend API
acceptanceCriteria: All implemented features should pass functional tests.
Usability and performance issues, if any, should be reported.

tasks.title: Document the Implemented Code
tasks.description: Write clear and concise documentation for the codebase, including comments and README files.
dependencies: Task 6: Perform Functional Testing on Implemented Features
acceptanceCriteria: Documentation should be clear and easy to understand.
All important parts of the codebase should have appropriate documentation.

tasks.title: Project Setup and Configuration
tasks.description: Set up and configure the development environment, version control system, CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure.
acceptanceCriteria: Development environment is set up and working for all team members
CI/CD pipelines are configured
Infrastructure is properly set up and integrated

tasks.title: Project-wide Documentation
tasks.description: Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for the project, including system architecture, API references, and development guidelines.
acceptanceCriteria: All project documentation is complete and up-to-date
Documentation serves as a valuable resource for the team and future developers

tasks.title: Project Status Reporting
tasks.description: Prepare and share weekly status reports detailing progress, blockers, and plans.
acceptanceCriteria: Weekly status reports are shared with stakeholders
Reports provide clear and actionable insights

tasks.title: Backlog Refinement
tasks.description: Collaborate with the product owner to refine the project backlog, ensuring it is well-defined, prioritized, and ready for development.
acceptanceCriteria: Backlog items are well-defined and prioritized
Development tasks are ready for implementation

tasks.title: Quality Assurance Planning
tasks.description: Plan and implement QA strategies, including test cases, automation scripts, and regression tests.
acceptanceCriteria: QA strategies are in place for all project components
Test cases, automation scripts, and regression tests are ready for implementation

tasks.title: Cross-sprint Integration and Dependencies Management
tasks.description: Manage dependencies between tasks across sprints, ensuring smooth integration of new features and components.
acceptanceCriteria: Dependencies between tasks are clearly defined and managed
New features and components integrate smoothly

subtasks.title: Define Project Objectives
subtasks.description: Write clear and concise project objectives for the scope document.
acceptanceCriteria: - The project objectives are clearly stated.
- The objectives are concise and specific.

subtasks.title: List Key Deliverables
subtasks.description: Create a comprehensive list of key deliverables for the project.
acceptanceCriteria: - All essential deliverables are listed.
- The list is clear and concise.

subtasks.title: Outline Timeline Details
subtasks.description: Create a detailed timeline for the project, including milestones and deadlines.
acceptanceCriteria: - The timeline is detailed and specific.
- Milestones and deadlines are clearly defined.

subtasks.title: Identify Team Capacity
subtasks.description: Determine the capacity of the project team, including resources and workload distribution.
acceptanceCriteria: - The team's capacity is accurately represented.
- Resources and workload distribution are clearly defined.

subtasks.title: Install Operating System Prerequisites
subtasks.description: Ensure the operating system is up-to-date and meets the minimum requirements specified for the chosen tech stack.
acceptanceCriteria: The operating system is up-to-date and meets the minimum requirements

subtasks.title: Install Development Tools
subtasks.description: Install necessary development tools such as a code editor, version control system, and package manager.
acceptanceCriteria: All development tools are correctly installed

subtasks.title: Set Up Project Repository
subtasks.description: Create and initialize a new project repository using the chosen version control system.
acceptanceCriteria: A new project repository is created and initialized

subtasks.title: Configure Environment Variables
subtasks.description: Set up environment variables as specified in the chosen tech stack for local development.
acceptanceCriteria: Environment variables are correctly configured for local development

subtasks.title: Install Tech Stack Dependencies
subtasks.description: Install all necessary dependencies specified by the chosen tech stack.
acceptanceCriteria: All tech stack dependencies are correctly installed

subtasks.title: Configure Build and Test Systems (if applicable)
subtasks.description: Set up build and test systems according to the chosen tech stack for continuous integration and testing.
acceptanceCriteria: Build and test systems are configured for continuous integration and testing

subtasks.title: Research and gather design inspiration
subtasks.description: Gather design inspiration from relevant sources to inform the project layout.
acceptanceCriteria: A collection of design inspirations is available for reference.

subtasks.title: Define project requirements and objectives
subtasks.description: Clarify the purpose, goals, and functional needs of the project layout.
acceptanceCriteria: A clear set of design requirements and objectives is established.

subtasks.title: Sketch initial wireframe ideas
subtasks.description: Generate rough sketches or wireframes to visualize potential project layouts.
acceptanceCriteria: A set of wireframe sketches is created to explore possible layouts.

subtasks.title: Select preferred wireframe concept
subtasks.description: Choose the most promising wireframe sketch as a basis for further refinement.
acceptanceCriteria: The preferred wireframe concept is chosen and documented.

subtasks.title: Refine wireframe with details
subtasks.description: Add details, such as UI components, typography, and color schemes to the selected wireframe.
acceptanceCriteria: The refined wireframe includes necessary UI components, typography, and color schemes.

subtasks.title: Create a high-fidelity mockup
subtasks.description: Transform the refined wireframe into a high-fidelity mockup, incorporating visual assets.
acceptanceCriteria: A high-fidelity mockup of the project layout is created.

subtasks.title: Analyze Design Layout for Frontend Components
subtasks.description: Study the approved design layout to understand the positioning, structure, and interaction points of each frontend component.
acceptanceCriteria: - The design layout is fully understood and documented.

subtasks.title: Set Up Component Templates
subtasks.description: Create reusable templates for each frontend component using the chosen tech stack.
dependsOn: Analyze Design Layout for Frontend Components
acceptanceCriteria: - Templates are created and saved.

subtasks.title: Develop Basic Functionality of First Component
subtasks.description: Implement the basic functionality (e.g., click events, data fetching) for one frontend component using its corresponding template.
acceptanceCriteria: - The basic functionality of the first frontend component is implemented.
- Functionality matches the design.

subtasks.title: Implement Visuals for First Component
subtasks.description: Add the visual elements (e.g., colors, fonts, images) to the first frontend component according to the approved design.
dependsOn: Develop Basic Functionality of First Component
acceptanceCriteria: - The visual elements are added to the first frontend component.
- Visuals match the design.

subtasks.title: Test and Debug First Frontend Component
subtasks.description: Perform functional testing and debugging of the first frontend component to ensure it works as intended.
acceptanceCriteria: - The first frontend component functions correctly.

subtasks.title: Replicate Remaining Components
subtasks.description: Apply the previously developed design patterns, functionality, and visuals to the rest of the frontend components.
dependsOn: Test and Debug First Frontend Component
acceptanceCriteria: - All remaining frontend components are functional, visually consistent with the design.
- All necessary interactions and animations are correctly implemented.

subtasks.title: Design API Endpoints
subtasks.description: Create a list of required API endpoints for the backend services and define their input/output parameters.
acceptanceCriteria: API endpoints are defined with appropriate HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
Input/output parameters for each endpoint are clearly specified

subtasks.title: Create API Specifications
subtasks.description: Develop detailed specifications for the APIs, including request and response formats, authentication methods, and error handling.
acceptanceCriteria: API specifications are complete and well-documented
Request and response formats are clearly defined

subtasks.title: Set Up Database Schema
subtasks.description: Create the database schema, defining tables, relationships, indices, and other necessary database structures.
acceptanceCriteria: Database schema is designed and clearly documented
Tables, relationships, indices, and other necessary structures are created

subtasks.title: Implement Server-Side Logic
subtasks.description: Write the server-side logic for API endpoints, including business rules, validation, and error handling.
acceptanceCriteria: Server-side logic is implemented for all required APIs
Business rules, validation, and error handling are properly integrated

subtasks.title: Secure Backend Services
subtasks.description: Implement security measures such as authentication, authorization, and encryption to protect the backend services.
acceptanceCriteria: Authentication and authorization are implemented for all APIs
Data is encrypted when necessary

subtasks.title: Identify Critical Frontend Functionalities
subtasks.description: List all the critical functionalities that need to be tested for the frontend components.
acceptanceCriteria: All critical functionalities should be identified.

subtasks.title: Identify Critical Backend Functionalities
subtasks.description: List all the critical functionalities that need to be tested for the backend components.
acceptanceCriteria: All critical functionalities should be identified.

subtasks.title: Select Testing Framework for Frontend
subtasks.description: Research and choose a suitable testing framework for frontend automated tests.
acceptanceCriteria: A testing framework has been selected for the frontend.

subtasks.title: Select Testing Framework for Backend
subtasks.description: Research and choose a suitable testing framework for backend automated tests.
acceptanceCriteria: A testing framework has been selected for the backend.

subtasks.title: Write Frontend Automated Test Cases
subtasks.description: Develop automated test cases for frontend components based on identified critical functionalities.
acceptanceCriteria: Test cases have been written for frontend components covering all identified critical functionalities.

subtasks.title: Write Backend Automated Test Cases
subtasks.description: Develop automated test cases for backend components based on identified critical functionalities.
acceptanceCriteria: Test cases have been written for backend components covering all identified critical functionalities.

subtasks.title: Validate Automated Tests
subtasks.description: Run tests to ensure they cover all critical functionalities and are efficient, reliable, and maintainable.
acceptanceCriteria: All tests should pass and cover all critical functionalities.
Tests should be efficient, reliable, and maintainable.

subtasks.title: Research and gather design inspiration for main pages
subtasks.description: Gather visual references, color palettes, typography choices, and layout ideas from existing successful designs in the industry. Document findings for easy access.
acceptanceCriteria: - Research findings are well-documented and easily accessible.
- The research results provide a clear direction for the design.

subtasks.title: Create low-fidelity wireframes for homepage
subtasks.description: Design simple, black-and-white sketches of the homepage that represent the layout and placement of key elements.
dependsOn: Research and gather design inspiration for main pages
acceptanceCriteria: - The wireframe is clearly labeled with key elements.
- The wireframe includes the necessary UI elements for the homepage.

subtasks.title: Create low-fidelity wireframes for product page
subtasks.description: Design simple, black-and-white sketches of the product page that represent the layout and placement of key elements.
dependsOn: Research and gather design inspiration for main pages
acceptanceCriteria: - The wireframe is clearly labeled with key elements.
- The wireframe includes the necessary UI elements for the product page.

subtasks.title: Create low-fidelity wireframes for checkout page
subtasks.description: Design simple, black-and-white sketches of the checkout page that represent the layout and placement of key elements.
dependsOn: Research and gather design inspiration for main pages
acceptanceCriteria: - The wireframe is clearly labeled with key elements.
- The wireframe includes the necessary UI elements for the checkout page.

subtasks.title: Review and iterate on wireframes
subtasks.description: Gather feedback from stakeholders, make necessary adjustments to the wireframes, and validate that they meet the acceptance criteria.
dependsOn: Create low-fidelity wireframes for product page
Create low-fidelity wireframes for checkout page
acceptanceCriteria: - Wireframes have been reviewed and iterated upon.
- The revised wireframes meet the acceptance criteria.

subtasks.title: Gather Design Assets and Brand Guidelines
subtasks.description: Collect all necessary design assets, color schemes, typography, and branding elements to ensure mockups adhere to the established guidelines.
acceptanceCriteria: All design assets and branding elements are readily available and organized

subtasks.title: Refine Wireframe Elements for UI/UX
subtasks.description: Enhance wireframe components by adding interactive elements, hover states, and other UI/UX details.
dependsOn: Gather Design Assets and Brand Guidelines
acceptanceCriteria: All wireframe elements are refined with basic UI/UX details

subtasks.title: Implement Visual Design Elements
subtasks.description: Apply visual design elements such as colors, typography, and images to the enhanced wireframes.
acceptanceCriteria: Mockups now have visual design elements applied

subtasks.title: Review and Iterate Design Based on Feedback
subtasks.description: Gather feedback from stakeholders, iterate on the mockup designs as needed, and ensure that all UI/UX details are addressed.
acceptanceCriteria: All feedback has been addressed and mockups have been iterated upon

subtasks.title: Analyze and Understand Mockups
subtasks.description: Study the provided mockups, noting key design elements and responsive behaviors.
acceptanceCriteria: Understand the design elements and responsive behaviors in the mockups.

subtasks.title: Create HTML Structure for Components
subtasks.description: Draft the basic structure of each frontend component according to the analyzed mockups.
acceptanceCriteria: Draft HTML structures for all components according to the mockups.

subtasks.title: Implement CSS Styles for Components
subtasks.description: Apply CSS styles to the created HTML structure, ensuring responsiveness.
dependsOn: Subtask: Create HTML Structure for Components
acceptanceCriteria: Apply CSS styles to all components and ensure responsiveness.

subtasks.title: Test Accessibility of Components
subtasks.description: Check each component's accessibility using tools such as WAVE or Lighthouse.
dependsOn: Subtask: Implement CSS Styles for Components
acceptanceCriteria: Test and ensure all components are accessible.

subtasks.title: Review and Refine Components
subtasks.description: Review the completed components, addressing any issues or inconsistencies.
acceptanceCriteria: Review and refine the frontend components as needed.

subtasks.title: Define API endpoints for product functionality
subtasks.description: List and describe the required API endpoints for retrieving product details, handling add to cart functionality.
acceptanceCriteria: - API endpoints should be defined and documented.

subtasks.title: Create basic CRUD operations for product data
subtasks.description: Implement Create, Read, Update, and Delete (CRUD) operations for managing product data in the backend.
dependsOn: Define API endpoints for product functionality
acceptanceCriteria: - Basic CRUD operations should be implemented and working as expected.

subtasks.title: Implement retrieving product details endpoint
subtasks.description: Develop the API endpoint to fetch product details by ID.
dependsOn: Create basic CRUD operations for product data
acceptanceCriteria: - The API endpoint should return the correct product details when called with a valid ID.
- The API endpoint should handle errors for invalid IDs.

subtasks.title: Implement add to cart functionality
subtasks.description: Develop the API endpoint for adding products to the user's cart.
dependsOn: Create basic CRUD operations for product data
acceptanceCriteria: - The API endpoint should accept a product ID and a user ID.
- The API endpoint should add the product to the user's cart.
- The API endpoint should handle errors for invalid IDs or full cart capacities.

subtasks.title: Write unit tests for product-related endpoints
subtasks.description: Develop and run unit tests to ensure the correctness of implemented API endpoints.
acceptanceCriteria: - All unit tests should pass.
- The API endpoints should be tested for edge cases and errors.

subtasks.title: Connect Frontend to Backend API (Setup)
subtasks.description: Configure the frontend to communicate with the backend API, including setting up appropriate endpoints.
dependsOn: Task 4: Implement Backend API for Product Functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Successful connection to the backend API established

subtasks.title: Fetch Data from Backend API
subtasks.description: Implement fetching data from the backend API and display it on the frontend.
dependsOn: Subtask 1: Connect Frontend to Backend API (Setup)
acceptanceCriteria: Data fetched from the backend and displayed on the frontend

subtasks.title: Test Data Fetching
subtasks.description: Perform unit tests to ensure data fetching works as expected.
dependsOn: Subtask 2: Fetch Data from Backend API
acceptanceCriteria: Tests pass for data fetching

subtasks.title: Implement Interactions with the Backend API
subtasks.description: Add functionality to interact with the backend API (e.g., add to cart), ensuring proper data flow.
dependsOn: Subtask 2: Fetch Data from Backend API
acceptanceCriteria: Interactions with the backend API work as expected

subtasks.title: Test Interaction with the Backend API
subtasks.description: Perform unit tests to ensure interactions with the backend API work as expected.
dependsOn: Subtask 4: Implement Interactions with the Backend API
acceptanceCriteria: Tests pass for interactions with the backend API

subtasks.title: Verify Frontend Components Functionality
subtasks.description: Check the functionality of each frontend component integrated with the backend API
acceptanceCriteria: - Each frontend component should function as expected.
- Any malfunctions or bugs should be logged.

subtasks.title: Perform Usability Testing
subtasks.description: Evaluate the user-friendliness and accessibility of implemented features
acceptanceCriteria: - The implemented features should be easy to use and navigate.
- Potential usability issues or accessibility concerns should be reported.

subtasks.title: Measure Feature Performance
subtasks.description: Test the speed, responsiveness, and resource consumption of implemented features
acceptanceCriteria: - Implemented features should perform efficiently with acceptable speed and resource usage.
- Performance bottlenecks or slowdowns should be identified and reported.

subtasks.title: Document Test Cases
subtasks.description: Create detailed test cases for each implemented feature based on functional, usability, and performance requirements
acceptanceCriteria: - Test cases should cover all aspects of the implemented features.
- Test cases should be clear, concise, and reproducible.

subtasks.title: Report Findings
subtasks.description: Compile and report any issues or problems discovered during functional testing
acceptanceCriteria: - Any issues or problems should be documented in a clear and concise manner.
- The report should include steps to reproduce the issue, expected behavior, and actual observed behavior.

subtasks.title: Analyze the code structure
subtasks.description: Review the overall structure of the codebase and identify key sections that require documentation.
acceptanceCriteria: The main sections of the codebase are identified.

subtasks.title: Write header comments for modules and functions
subtasks.description: Add clear and concise comments at the top of each module and function explaining its purpose, inputs, outputs, and any important assumptions or dependencies.
acceptanceCriteria: All modules and functions have appropriate header comments.

subtasks.title: Create README files for key projects
subtasks.description: Write a clear and concise README file for each project, explaining its purpose, dependencies, installation instructions, and usage.
acceptanceCriteria: Each project has a comprehensive README file.

subtasks.title: Write in-line comments for complex logic
subtasks.description: Add inline comments to explain any complex or non-obvious logic within the code.
acceptanceCriteria: All complex logic has appropriate inline comments.

risks.title: Deliverables
risks.description: The small team size and potential underutilization of resources could result in delays or missed deadlines.
risks.mitigation: Implement Agile practices to adapt to changing priorities, monitor progress closely, and adjust the plan as needed.

risks.title: Backend Development
risks.description: The team lacks a member with expertise in backend development, which may cause delays or require external assistance.
risks.mitigation: Consider hiring a temporary contractor or training one of the existing team members to handle backend tasks.

risks.title: Full-stack Development
risks.description: With no full-stack developer on the team, coordinating tasks and ensuring smooth handoff between frontend and backend may be challenging.
risks.mitigation: Cross-train team members to cover both frontend and backend development or consider hiring a full-stack developer.

milestones.title: Draft Project Scope Document
milestones.description: Create and draft project scope document, including objectives, key deliverables, timeline, and team capacity.

milestones.title: Set Up Development Environment
milestones.description: Configure and set up the development environment for the project based on the chosen tech stack.

milestones.title: Design Project Layout
milestones.description: Create a wireframe or mockup of the project layout, including user interface design.

milestones.title: Implement Frontend Components
milestones.description: Develop frontend components based on the approved design, ensuring compatibility with the chosen tech stack.

milestones.title: Set Up Backend Services
milestones.description: Create and configure backend services, including APIs, databases, and server-side logic.

milestones.title: Write Automated Tests
milestones.description: Develop automated tests for the frontend and backend components to ensure their functionality and compatibility.

milestones.title: Design Preliminary Wireframes
milestones.description: Create wireframes for the main pages, including homepage, product page, and checkout page.

milestones.title: Refine Wireframes into Mockups
milestones.description: Convert wireframes into high-fidelity mockups, including UI/UX details and visual design.

milestones.title: Create Frontend Components Based on Mockups
milestones.description: Develop frontend components based on the provided mockups, ensuring they are responsive and accessible.

milestones.title: Implement Backend API for Product Functionality
milestones.description: Develop the backend API for product-related functionality, such as retrieving product details and handling add to cart.

milestones.title: Integrate Frontend Components with Backend API
milestones.description: Connect the frontend components to the backend API, ensuring proper data flow between client and server.

recommendations.description: All sprints appear to have adequate resources. No adjustments needed.

project.name: E-commerce Mobile App
project.description: A full-featured e-commerce mobile app with user authentication, product browsing, shopping cart, checkout, and order tracking.
project.title: E-commerce Mobile App

sprints.name: Sprint 1
sprints.startDate: Each sprint should have a clear goal

tasks.title: Define User Personas and User Stories
tasks.description: Research and document user personas, their needs, goals, and pain points. Create a set of user stories that outline the functional requirements for the app.
acceptanceCriteria: User personas are clearly defined and documented.
User stories cover all essential user scenarios.
tasks.sprintStartDate: Each sprint should have a clear goal

tasks.title: Design Wireframes for the Home Screen
tasks.description: Create wireframes for the home screen of the app, focusing on layout, navigation, and main features.
acceptanceCriteria: Wireframes are well-structured and visually appealing.
Wireframes effectively convey the intended user experience.
tasks.sprintStartDate: Each sprint should have a clear goal

tasks.title: Create Mockups for the Home Screen
tasks.description: Refine the wireframes into high-fidelity mockups, adding colors, fonts, and interactive elements.
acceptanceCriteria: Mockups are polished and closely resemble the final product.
Mockups effectively convey the intended user experience.
tasks.sprintStartDate: Each sprint should have a clear goal

tasks.title: Set Up Firebase Backend for User Authentication
tasks.description: Configure Firebase for user authentication, including email and password registration, login, and password recovery.
acceptanceCriteria: Firebase is set up and configured for user authentication.
User registration, login, and password recovery functionalities are implemented.
tasks.sprintStartDate: Each sprint should have a clear goal

tasks.title: Develop Home Screen Component in React Native
tasks.description: Implement the home screen component using React Native, adhering to the provided mockups.
acceptanceCriteria: Home screen component is implemented according to the mockups.
Component is functional and responsive.
tasks.sprintStartDate: Each sprint should have a clear goal

tasks.title: Write Unit Tests for Home Screen Component
tasks.description: Write unit tests for the home screen component, ensuring it behaves as expected under various conditions.
acceptanceCriteria: Unit tests are written for the home screen component.
Tests cover all essential scenarios and edge cases.
tasks.sprintStartDate: Each sprint should have a clear goal

tasks.title: Review and Provide Feedback on Designs
tasks.description: Review the designs, provide feedback to the design team, and discuss any necessary changes.
acceptanceCriteria: All team members have reviewed and provided constructive feedback on the designs.
Design changes are agreed upon and documented.
tasks.sprintStartDate: Each sprint should have a clear goal

subtasks.title: Research and document user demographics
subtasks.description: Gather and document information about user demographics such as age, gender, occupation, income level, education level, location, etc.
acceptanceCriteria: User demographics are clearly documented

subtasks.title: Identify user goals and needs
subtasks.description: List the primary goals and needs of each user persona based on their demographic information and potential use cases for the app
acceptanceCriteria: User goals and needs are clearly defined for each persona

subtasks.title: Document user pain points
subtasks.description: Identify and document the common pain points that users may experience when trying to achieve their goals with the app or in related scenarios
acceptanceCriteria: User pain points are clearly documented

subtasks.title: Create user persona profiles
subtasks.description: Combine the demographics, goals, needs, and pain points to create a comprehensive profile for each user persona
acceptanceCriteria: User persona profiles are clearly defined

subtasks.title: Analyze app functional requirements
subtasks.description: Study the app's purpose, features, and capabilities to identify the essential scenarios that each user persona will encounter
acceptanceCriteria: Essential app functional requirements for each user scenario are identified

subtasks.title: Write user stories
subtasks.description: Craft user stories that outline the functional requirements for the app from the perspective of each user persona and their essential scenarios
acceptanceCriteria: User stories are clearly defined for all essential user scenarios

subtasks.title: Research and gather inspiration for home screen design
subtasks.description: Gather visual references from similar apps, analyze their layouts, navigation, and main features to inform the design of our app's home screen.
acceptanceCriteria: Research materials are well-organized and relevant

subtasks.title: Sketch rough wireframe layout ideas
subtasks.description: Create multiple rough sketches of possible home screen layouts, considering navigation and main features.
dependsOn: Research and gather inspiration for home screen design
acceptanceCriteria: Rough sketches are visually appealing and represent multiple ideas

subtasks.title: Select the best layout idea and refine it
subtasks.description: Choose one of the rough sketches as the best option, then refine and clean up that design to create a polished wireframe.
acceptanceCriteria: Refined wireframe is well-structured and visually appealing

subtasks.title: Add navigation elements to the wireframe
subtasks.description: Include navigation components in the wireframe, such as menus, buttons, and links, ensuring that they are easily accessible.
dependsOn: Select the best layout idea and refine it
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation elements are properly integrated into the wireframe

subtasks.title: Integrate main features into the wireframe
subtasks.description: Add key features of the app to the wireframe, considering their placement and functionality.
dependsOn: Add navigation elements to the wireframe
acceptanceCriteria: Main features are properly represented in the wireframe

subtasks.title: Refine Low-Fidelity Wireframes
subtasks.description: Convert existing low-fidelity wireframes into high-fidelity ones, maintaining the original layout and structure.
acceptanceCriteria: Wireframes are revised with improved detail

subtasks.title: Select Colors and Fonts
subtasks.description: Choose appropriate colors and fonts that align with the brand guidelines.
acceptanceCriteria: Colors and fonts are selected and documented

subtasks.title: Add Basic Interactive Elements
subtasks.description: Include basic interactive elements such as buttons, dropdowns, and sliders.
acceptanceCriteria: Interactive elements are added to the mockups

subtasks.title: Review and Iterate on Mockups
subtasks.description: Gather feedback from stakeholders and iterate on the mockups as needed.
acceptanceCriteria: Mockups are polished and reflect feedback from stakeholders

subtasks.title: Document User Flows
subtasks.description: Create a detailed document outlining the user flows within the home screen.
acceptanceCriteria: User flows are documented clearly

subtasks.title: Install and Initialize Firebase Project
subtasks.description: Set up a new Firebase project, install necessary Firebase tools, and initialize the Firebase SDK for user authentication.
acceptanceCriteria: - Firebase project is created
- Necessary tools are installed and configured

subtasks.title: Configure Firebase Authentication for Email and Password
subtasks.description: Set up email/password provider in the Firebase console, and configure rules for authentication.
acceptanceCriteria: - Email/password provider is enabled
- Authentication rules are set up

subtasks.title: Implement User Registration Functionality
subtasks.description: Create a new user account using email and password, and handle registration errors.
dependsOn: Configure Firebase Authentication for Email and Password
acceptanceCriteria: - User can register with email and password

subtasks.title: Implement Login Functionality
subtasks.description: Allow users to log in using their registered email and password.
dependsOn: Configure Firebase Authentication for Email and Password
acceptanceCriteria: - Users can log in with their registered email and password

subtasks.title: Implement Password Recovery Functionality
subtasks.description: Allow users to recover their password by providing a recovery email.
dependsOn: Configure Firebase Authentication for Email and Password
acceptanceCriteria: - Users can request password recovery via email

subtasks.title: Test User Registration, Login, and Password Recovery
subtasks.description: Perform manual and automated tests to ensure the functionality of user registration, login, and password recovery.
acceptanceCriteria: - Manual tests for user registration, login, and password recovery are successful

subtasks.title: Study provided mockups
subtasks.description: Analyze the design details, layout, and interaction patterns of the home screen component as per the given mockups.
acceptanceCriteria: Understand the design elements and their relationships

subtasks.title: Set up React Native project structure
subtasks.description: Create a new React Native project with appropriate folder structure for the home screen component.
acceptanceCriteria: Have a valid React Native project with the correct folder structure

subtasks.title: Create HomeScreen.js file
subtasks.description: Generate a new JavaScript file for the home screen component.
dependsOn: Set up React Native project structure
acceptanceCriteria: Have a new HomeScreen.js file in the appropriate folder

subtasks.title: Implement basic home screen layout
subtasks.description: Add initial markup and styling to match the high-level design of the home screen.
acceptanceCriteria: Have a basic functional layout that matches the design

subtasks.title: Implement component interactions
subtasks.description: Add necessary event listeners and logic to make the home screen responsive.
acceptanceCriteria: Have a fully functional home screen component with interactions

subtasks.title: Test home screen responsiveness
subtasks.description: Verify that the home screen component works correctly on different device sizes and orientations.
acceptanceCriteria: Ensure the home screen component is responsive across different device sizes and orientations

subtasks.title: Review and refactor (if needed)
subtasks.description: Thoroughly review the code for potential optimizations, refactoring if necessary.
acceptanceCriteria: Have a clean and optimized codebase that meets performance requirements

subtasks.title: Identify essential scenarios and edge cases for Home Screen Component
subtasks.description: List out all possible scenarios and edge cases that the unit tests for the home screen component should cover.
acceptanceCriteria: All essential scenarios and edge cases are identified.

subtasks.title: Set up testing environment for Home Screen Component
subtasks.description: Configure the required testing tools, libraries, or frameworks to write tests for the home screen component.
dependsOn: Identify essential scenarios and edge cases for Home Screen Component
acceptanceCriteria: Testing environment is successfully set up.

subtasks.title: Write test case for loading the Home Screen Component
subtasks.description: Develop a unit test to ensure the home screen component loads correctly.
dependsOn: Set up testing environment for Home Screen Component
acceptanceCriteria: Test case is written to verify loading of the home screen component.

subtasks.title: Write test case for rendering Home Screen Component data
subtasks.description: Develop a unit test to ensure that the home screen component correctly renders its data.
dependsOn: Set up testing environment for Home Screen Component
acceptanceCriteria: Test case is written to verify rendering of home screen component data.

subtasks.title: Write test case for handling user interactions on the Home Screen Component
subtasks.description: Develop a unit test to ensure that the home screen component handles user interactions correctly.
dependsOn: Set up testing environment for Home Screen Component
acceptanceCriteria: Test case is written to verify user interaction handling.

subtasks.title: Review Initial Designs
subtasks.description: Thoroughly examine designs provided, identify potential issues and areas for improvement.
acceptanceCriteria: - Designs are examined in detail.

subtasks.title: Provide Preliminary Feedback
subtasks.description: Document constructive feedback on the reviewed designs, highlighting potential issues and suggestions for improvements.
acceptanceCriteria: - Feedback is provided in a clear and constructive manner.

subtasks.title: Discuss Preliminary Feedback with the Design Team
subtasks.description: Meet with the design team to discuss the preliminary feedback, address questions or concerns, and agree upon necessary changes.
acceptanceCriteria: - Feedback has been discussed with the design team.

subtasks.title: Revise Designs Based on Feedback
subtasks.description: Update designs according to the agreed-upon changes and revisions.
dependsOn: Discuss Preliminary Feedback with the Design Team
acceptanceCriteria: - Designs have been updated based on feedback.

subtasks.title: Document Revised Design Changes
subtasks.description: Record all design changes and necessary documentation, including rationale for changes.
acceptanceCriteria: - All design changes are documented.

risks.title: Sprint Delivery
risks.description: The underutilization in Sprint 1 may lead to delays in subsequent sprints due to a backlog of work.
risks.mitigation: Plan for contingencies, such as buffer time or additional resources, to accommodate potential delays.

risks.title: Backend Development
risks.description: The team lacks a member with expertise in backend development, which may lead to delays or dependencies on external resources.
risks.mitigation: Consider hiring a temporary contractor or freelancer for the duration of this project, or provide additional training for one of the existing team members.

risks.title: Full-stack Development
risks.description: The team composition is specialized and lacks a full-stack developer, which may lead to communication issues and potential delays.
risks.mitigation: Consider hiring or training a team member with full-stack development skills for future projects.

milestones.title: Define User Personas and User Stories
milestones.description: Research and document user personas, their needs, goals, and pain points. Create a set of user stories that outline the functional requirements for the app.

milestones.title: Design Wireframes for the Home Screen
milestones.description: Create wireframes for the home screen of the app, focusing on layout, navigation, and main features.

milestones.title: Create Mockups for the Home Screen
milestones.description: Refine the wireframes into high-fidelity mockups, adding colors, fonts, and interactive elements.

events.date: Each sprint should have a clear goal
events.title: Sprint 1 Start

timeline.startDate: Each sprint should have a clear goal

recommendations.description: All sprints appear to have adequate resources. No adjustments needed.
